title: Dwain Chambers
summary: Dwain Anthony Chambers (born 5 April 1978) is a British track sprinter. He has won international medals at World and European levels and is one of the fastest European sprinters in the history of athletics.[2] His primary event is the 100 metres, with a best of 9.97 seconds, which ranks him fifth on the British all-time list.[3] He is the European record holder for the 60 metres and 4×100 metres relay events with 6.42 seconds and 37.73 s respectively.
